title: Stellar Blade boss receives presidential commendation for his contributions to the Korean videogame industry
contents: Hyung-tae Kim, CEO of Korean game studio Shift Up and director of 2025 gooner game of the year Stellar Blade, has received a Presidential Commendation for his contributions to the development of South Korea's videogame industry.
